channel.title: Sprite
channel.description:
playing around in Gimp. This is my second sprite ever. took me ages to make it so feedback is appreciated.
[img]http://i160.photobucket.com/albums/t170/Santaowner/sprite-1.png[/img]
c&c is appreciated

item.title: Sprite
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

exe626:

OmidSadn, stfu. God damn you’re annoying.

Right back atcha =]

[quote=“frost21, post:10, topic:188761”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=251553.msg2107891#msg2107891 date=1205481206]
OmidSadn, stfu. God damn you’re annoying.
[/quote]

Agreed,your an annoying kid Omidsadn…all you do is rate high and suckup.

Well It doesn’t look that great to me.4.5/10

-Colors dont look good
-Text could use some work.
-The way those lines flow outwards on each side…just doesn’t look appealing to me.
+Love the pentooling around his arms[/quote]
Thank you for that wonderful comment. I do rate high, but I don’t suckup, it’s called being polite and nice. I’m not an ass like some people. =]. And at least you explained why you rated it low. So now i can see why it’s not that great, it’s only cause i’ve never seen a sprite. -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Sprite
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

[quote=“nator123123, post:7, topic:188761”][quote author=OmidSan link=topic=251553.msg2107576#msg2107576 date=1205466600]

imo, I hate sprite tags.

4/10

Then don’t post?

I really like it, it’s pretty good, 9/10. I’m still looking at it and i know there could be improvement, an image is never perfect. =P
[/quote]

…DUDE
even if I hate sprite tags
doesn’t mean I shouldn’t post.
Damn…[/quote]
you rated it low because you didn’t like sprite tags in general.
So don’t post on your Opinion about the topic in GENERAL.
You gave it such a low score and didn’t explain why
that’s why I said it.
So explain why it’s a 4/10 =]

Read full topic

@javis wrote:

actually i lowered the contrast by i think it was -50. After i lower much more than that i felt it started loosing effects. Ahh im never good with text i think i might read up on some tuts about it

item.title: Sprite
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I like sprites, and I like the lines supporting power around his arms. I dislike the BG and how perfect the lines around his arms are. And again, work on the contrast and text, those are killing your signatures severely. Show me the final product before adding so much contrast.

Read full topic
